description: Online quizzes assessing understanding of course material, with four quizzes throughout the term (1-1.5 hours each). Feedback provided via LMS.
Individual reports (6-10 pages each) answering questions from practical lab projects on solar cells and systems. Marked against criteria with LMS feedback.

Capstone project involving stand-alone PV system design with four deliverables: preliminary design report, presentation, final report, and reflection report. Includes component sizing, economic analysis, and compliance with Australian standards. Hurdle requirement: minimum 60% to pass.
